DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

NoncurrentAssets.label: Long-Lived Assets
NoncurrentAssets.description: Long-lived assets other than financial instruments, long-term customer relationships of a financial institution, mortgage and other servicing rights, deferred policy acquisition costs, and deferred tax assets.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Restricted Stock Award, Net of Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.description: Number of shares issued during the period related to Restricted Stock Awards, net of any shares forfeited.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Net of Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards issued during the period, net of the stock value of such awards forfeited.

TaxAdjustmentsSettlementsAndUnusualProvi.label: Tax Adjustments, Settlements, and Unusual Provisions
TaxAdjustmentsSettlementsAndUnusualProvi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to previously recorded tax expense. Includes, but is not limited to, significant settlements of income tax disputes, and unusual tax positions or infrequent actions taken by the entity, including tax assessment reversal, and IRS tax settlement.

CapitalizedComputerSoftwareGross.label: Capitalized Computer Software, Gross
CapitalizedComputerSoftwareGross.description: Amount before accumulated amortization of capitalized costs for computer software, including but not limited to, acquired and internally developed computer software.

DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.label: Long-term Debt, Gross
DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.description: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Share-based Compensation Cost
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from share-based compensation.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to nondeductible expense for share-based payment arrangement.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Research, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to research tax credit.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets to be Disposed of
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long-lived assets held for abandonment, exchange or sale.

LeaseAndRentalExpense.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense
LeaseAndRentalExpense.description: Amount of rent expense incurred for leased assets, including but not limited to, furniture and equipment, that is not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Payments, Due Next Rolling Twelve Months
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease, due in next rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

ProceedsFromStockPlans.label: Proceeds from Stock Plans
ProceedsFromStockPlans.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the stock plan during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Authorized Amount
StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1.description: Amount of stock repurchase plan authorized.

StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingAuthorize.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Remaining Authorized Repurchase Amount
StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingAuthorize.description: Amount remaining of a stock repurchase plan authorized.

SubleaseIncome.label: Sublease Income
SubleaseIncome.description: Amount of sublease income excluding finance and operating lease expense.

TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.label: Treasury Stock Acquired, Average Cost Per Share
TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.description: Total cost of shares repurchased divided by the total number of shares repurchased.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.
